title: [Self-Directed] Mobile Learning-Based Program for Enhancing Practical Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic mathematical concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies in a mobile learning environment. Analysis of real-world application cases through interview-based case studies.

learning_goals: Solve practical math problems with 80% accuracy using mobile learning tools
Explain at least three impacts of mobile technology on mathematical work processes through case studies
Propose strategies for establishing mobile learning plans within an organization based on interview analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
